website_summaries.verdict: This metal framed box spring is built to last and will withstand heavier weights. Our most recommended piece for overall quality.
pros: Super durable box spring piece with ample support for your mattress
The parts are shipped unassembled, saving you the cost of freight shipping

customer_reviews.title: Lasts about a year. The bars are sinking in ...
customer_reviews.text: Lasts about a year. The bars are sinking in the middle and it squeaks A LOT. Wish I could just get rid of it right away. I've had it for a little over a year and don't think I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: cjmora

customer_reviews.title: On the surface this looks like a great deal - all metal
customer_reviews.text: The slats on this are too wide to properly support a quality mattress - a full 7.5 inches between each metal slat. To properly support a mattress (as I now know) slats should not have more than 4 inches between them. On the surface this looks like a great deal - all metal, no chemically treated materials. But if the box spring cannot support the mattress than any amount of money is a waste. We bought a $1000 mattress and I was not going to risk ruining that mattress with this cheap box spring. Unfortunately, I bought 2 of these before speaking with a reputable mattress company and now have to sell them at the next yard sale.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm2012

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars for cover and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this box spring for apparently way too much money. The box itself is fine, but the cover is a nightmare. The one it comes with (king size) does NOT fit. I contacted Zinus for a replacement since now the boxspring is already all put together. They sent out a new one which is even SMALLER than the first one. So move the bed move the mattress try to get another cover on this thing just to realize.. Nope. Still doesn't work. I emailed them again with the dimensions of the box spring since apparently they don't know their own product. Wish I hadn't spent a dime on this thing. Waste of time, too.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne B

customer_reviews.title: NOT COMPATIBLE WITH PANEL BED FRAMES!
customer_reviews.text: Due to the framework of this boxspring (main support running through middle), it forces the middle of the box spring to be more elevated on the panel bed frame’s horizontal slats, which causes a rocking back and forth with the shifting of weight. Extremely displeased.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Photo vs. Reality... Photo: 1, Reality: -10.
customer_reviews.text: It’s time for your favorite game: mismatched product with product photo time!! This “bed frame” is nothing like the photo. If your idea of “minimal assembly” is 50 pieces of scrap metal and some ineffective “tools”, and 3+ hours of work, then sure. Yeah. This is totally “minimal assembly”. IF! However, you are interested in purchasing a box spring that is an actual box spring, (and not several pieces of metal with a canvas sack around it) then you should probably keep searching. Because this is likely not what you’re looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good for its purpose but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this 5 stars, but after a year a few things transpired. The bars inside do not stay in place. I've used zip ties to lock them down. The middle bar seems to incline towards the middle causing the bars perpendicular to pop out of place constantly. Now, with the zip ties, in the passed month we haven't had any issues. I am interested to see how long this box spring lasts bc it is metal however I use a sheet to protect the fabric bc it seems the fabric is kind of thin.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: do not buy any of Zinus mattress products
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mattress and boxspring with the same manufacturer and read the specs to make sure dimensions are identical. Ordered a Firm and it turned out to be foamy and soft- not FIRM AT ALL. Imagine kitchen sponge soft. Not only that, it was overhanging the boxspring by 1.5 inch on each side. Both products are from same manufacturer and brand so no reason for sizing to mismatch. The mattress is poor quality and does not fit full size sheets. I even tried queen size sheets. They blocked me from leaving a review on the mattress so writing one here to warn customers.
customer_reviews.author: PDX Recruiting

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Received our steel box spring for our king bed today and had it assembled in about an hour by myself. Very easy to put together -- I even put it together inside our king bed frame since I didn't have any other place to do it. While the individual parts are not labeled, it is easy to figure out which parts go where. The hardest part for me was figuring out which way the cover was supposed to go! :) Feels very solid and hope it last!
customer_reviews.author: Marcellino B.

customer_reviews.title: not your father's box spring
customer_reviews.text: These days, you don't have to worry about how to get a giant box spring home. All 45 pounds of this puppy shows up at your doorstep in a compact box that's easy to carry upstairs and simple to assemble. The latter took me about 30 minutes, using the clear instructions and the included tools. The light steel construction distributes the weight of the mattress and the human (OK, maybe the occasional canine) bodies that rest atop it in a way that makes a heavier boxspring unnecessary. The fabric 'envelope' zips snugly around the finished metal frame. I recently assembled a smaller (twin) boxspring that uses wood slats. I prefer this metal assembly by a hair. Heartily recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David A. BaerTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Ordered full, got full/queen
customer_reviews.text: It clearly states in the description that it comes in twin, full, queen, king, etc. Excited to see that it's advertised as a FULL size, I ordered it. WRONG! The box stated full/queen. Now I'm stuck with a box spring that is TOO BIG for my mattress. It was a pain to put together (expected that) and taking it out of the box was a joke. How am I suppose to return it without a box? Don't be fooled like I was. It is NOT a FULL size!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, not a solid surface (eg not great for foam mattress)
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo - mixed feelings on this... SO glad the box spring is "build your own" and it is great. The problem is I did not realize there is ~8 inches in between the metal rails so my 10in foam mattress needs to have a solid board. I'm headed to home depot today to get some peg board. It would be nice if you had the option to purchase an add on that is a solid surface.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer c williams

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is very easy and convenient to installed BUT its much smaller than a twin mattress and I bought the one from the same brand Zinus it looks terrible it doesn't seat well on top of this box spring. First I thought I had order the Twin XL mattress but that is not the case, I order both Twin size and they do NOT match by a difference of 2 inches length and 4 inches width. Here is a picture of how bad it looks
customer_reviews.author: Carlos O.

customer_reviews.title: This is a awesome box spring
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome box spring. I had the old style box spring with coils and as I purchased a new mattress it was necessary for me to find the correct box spring that would work with my new mattress. The assembly is easy, the construction is awesome and I dont think I will ever need a new box spring. I would suggest not doing a total unzip on the cover, well for me what worked best. I just did a unzip on the top portion and put in on like a pillow case. Some may prefer doing it a different way but this worked best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: This was light weigh and could be assembled in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This was light weigh and could be assembled in the space which appealed to me, unfortunately the metal was bent and I didn't realize it until the last frustrating step. In order to get it to work correctly the piece needed to be bent back considerably and during the process one of the metal bars broke. If I hadn't been pressed for time and at the end of the project I would have returned it. So far it is holding up and without having had a piece bent I would have given it 5/5 stars. I just wish they had packaged it differently to have avoided this problem in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle King

customer_reviews.title: Light, sturdy foundation
customer_reviews.text: Just to clarify, this is a foundation and not a "Box Spring". There are no springs inside. This isn't a problem for me as I already expected this. Assembly is easy if you've ever assembled anything before. There's a few screws and a few nuts and it comes with the Hex wrench and the socket wrench to put them on. I found it easier to stand it up and put it together, then flip it over and tighten the other bolts. Then lay it on the bed. It was slightly smaller than the size of a standard mattress but it still supports the mattress well. The foundation is light and sturdy and works well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: I purchased two of the twin Smart Box mattresses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of the twin Smart Box mattresses. Although this is not an actual box "spring" mattress, it does raise the mattress up to a convenient height. With a decent top mattress comfort should be adequate. The instructions for assembly were clear and easy to follow and it took only about 1/2 hour to assemble each one. Disposable tools were provided, so I did not need to search for or borrow any. The cover was a bit awkward to put on by myself, but using a little practical strategy they did go on smoothly. I'm of retirement age, so I'm sure anyone reading this will have no trouble putting this together.
customer_reviews.author: cardinal

customer_reviews.title: fine, but the diagram isn't helpful when you get ...
customer_reviews.text: This requires assembly and has no written instructions, fine, but the diagram isn't helpful when you get to the last part (the curved ends) and there don't appear to be nearly enough screws and bolts. The video that comes with this order doesn't match up with the actual parts or the part names on the instructions. ''I've assembled MANY pieces of furniture before and never run into anything like this. If I don't get someone from this company to give me a REAL instructional video soon I'm returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product that does the job. It's a box spring so I don't know what some of the negative reviewers where expecting. Don't believe the negative reviews on this product. It's easy to assemble, holds up the mattress, and easily supports my 240 lb body. Don't hesitate to buy this product! I'm not an engineer or mechanically gifted and I put this together in 15 minutes. The parts are extremely easy to figure out and you don't need to read the instructions if you have half a brain. It's pretty obvious what goes where.
customer_reviews.author: Tinywv

customer_reviews.title: Assembled in less than an hour, sturdy and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Our old box spring that came with the mattress broke after a little over a year. Annoying. We were tentative about building a box spring from a metal frame rather than the traditional model, but everything went really smoothly. One person put this together in less than an hour. We did not have trouble fitting the cover over the bars. Its metal, so obviously it would take a lot to break it. I was worried that it might not be comfortable since we noticed such a difference when the wooden box spring broke, but I don't notice anything at all. All I feel is supported. I would definitely purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: For a pinch/short term; not long term.
customer_reviews.text: Ok. So I ordered this product 2/17/2016 and it was ok for awhile. It is pretty easy to assemble if the directions are clear and stickers are not placed in the wrong place. 😑 However, here we are July 2020 and my bed has collapsed multiple times (the braces do not stay in place as seen in the pic). They easily pop out. Last night I felt something "pop" and opened it up to find the frame snapped. Luckily my daughter wasn't sleeping on this and it didn't happen while I was asleep so I was able to catch myself. 😳 It's ok for a pinch, but for long term use is not acceptable quality. Beware guys. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: My old box spring was so old and worn that it sunk in. Every time I moved the bed made a noise and shook. So I took the plunge and got this. The instructions are so easy that my kids could have done it. My bed sits a bit highter now which I like. Plus it doesn't make an annoying creaking sound everytime you roll over. I can toss and turn all night without waking my imaginary boyfriend. The only thing I will add is that it will make your bed a bit more firm. But overall I love it and will probably get more for the rest of the beds in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE WASTE OF MONEY SQUEAKS IN FIRST MONTH
customer_reviews.text: I bought this box queen size. The assembly was not difficult and I was happy first week, after I left for 2 weeks out of town. When I came back it started to make little beat of noise and I was thinking it’s mild and I will not complain. But after a month it’s start to squeak like 30 year old gramma bed. And I missed my return window with amazon. I tried return on week 6 and they denied to accept return. I wasted my money!
customer_reviews.author: Zhanna mizgina

customer_reviews.title: Strong durabilty and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered a different brand queen size box spring, that was ready-made. But the delivery men could not get it up the stairs. I went online searching to maybe size up 2 twin box springs as a substitute, but came across this box instead. I had never heard of a self-assemble box spring mattress...PEEERFECT! It's heavy, so I had my nephew carry it upstairs, but because the box was so much more narrow, the size was not an issue for getting it upstairs anymore. The assembly was easy, took less than 30 minutes. It's strong and durable. It's perfectly comfortable with my 8" memory foam mattresses on top. I'm so glad that I came across this.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It seems very sturdy and was easy for me to put together. When I ordered it I thought it came already together so it was a surprise to have to put it together myself. It comes with all the tools needed too. It has also added some height to my bed which I love and it seems cleaner than the box springs that are made with cotton and foam. I like that it is metal since I have bad allergies. Can easily wipe it down or open the box spring cover and wipe down the metal.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, be prepared this product will take you by surprise. What I expected was a typical queen size box spring to be delivered. (The picture on the site is the model but after it's assembled.) What arrived was a very long, large, semi-heavy, and compact box that was delivered. This was not the expected product that I saw online nor what I visually thought I was getting. However, I begrudgingly assembled the frame and surprisingly was shocked by the design and quality of the whole product. This frame was incredibly easy to assemble, lightweight, and durable. Bottom line, I highly recommend this product and would like to replace all the other old fashion bulky box springs in my home!
customer_reviews.author: Kimiko

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is quite difficult to put together and the reason for only 4 stars. It comes in a box with lots of parts. It is very heavy duty when put together. My son recently moved into an apartment and had been given a mattress but wanted more support and since he's 6'3" and 300# and also wanted a higher elevation and it has been very helpful. However, we also added a heavy duty bed frame to get him off the floor with a much higher bed. Makes it much easier to sit and get in and out of the bed when you are so tall. So, overall, I would recommend. Just be ready for the time and energy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Mother Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to set up and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous I would not be able to put this together, but it was the easiest thing I ever put together. They made it very easy, gave you the tools, everything fit. It may have took me 15 mins, and I am a very petite older lady. The cover went on easily and fit the twin bed perfectly! It is very sturdy, yet light and easy to handle. In a few weeks I will be ordering another one when we do our next bedroom. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: awesome boxspring!!!
customer_reviews.text: first off this is definitely a super cheap (price wise) boxspring. This is only because you have to put it together yourself. It comes with fairly good instructions and can, mostly, be put together by one person. It took me about 1hr and 10min to do myself with the included tools. Its not super heavy either. It feels very well made and the included cover feels pretty nice as well. Works very well with our Memory foam mattress and lifts it up enough on our bedframe. i would recommend this to anyone who wants a well made boxspring and is willing to put it together themselves to save possibly hundreds of dollars from most stores.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Too firm, drags in center
customer_reviews.text: I attempted to return this product after a month, but decided to give it more time to “break in”. I’m on month three and it dips so far into the center, you can’t sleep anywhere else that in the center. (Don’t try sharing the bed with another person!) I thought I was being dramatic until my parents came to stay and woke up with an aching back and asked where the hell id gotten the mattress, that there supposed to last 5 years. Bottom line, not broken in after three months. Incredibly firm, other than only the center where it forces you to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amorris0715

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy replacement for king box springs
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a pair of 7-year old Beautyre$t king box springs that were literally collapsing. Warranty denied, of course. Anyway, the Zinus Anita king foundation is a very sturdy replacement. I can't imagine this thing would ever bend or deform. It went together in 30-40 minutes and fits our existing frame and traditional mattress perfectly. The cover also fits well and seems to be made of good quality material. Now our mattress no longer sags! Great product that will extend the life of our current mattress and will work with our next one. And no way will we even consider traditional box springs in the future!
customer_reviews.author: MikeB

customer_reviews.title: A lot of pieces, sturdy and affordable option
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and was a bit overwhelmed by the sheer number of parts inside. The directions claim putting this together is "As easy as 1, 2, 3, ......" and I think the focus should be on the '.......". Lol! It isn't hard to assemble, and once assembled it's very easy to slip the fabric cover on; however, there are a ton of pieces involved. It helps to have 2 people for the simple fact of being able to track down every piece for each step. If one is patient, then this box spring isn't a bad option. If one has little tolerance/patience, then I believer there may be more feasible options.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bollom

customer_reviews.title: Possibly received a used item...
customer_reviews.text: I had to give this frame four stars because we are fairly certain some items were used. A few of the parts were not packaged with zip ties, and the fabric cover for the bed frame had some holes in it which would have been nearly impossible to obtain during shipping due to the casing it was in. HOWEVER, we do like the frame. We ordered it for a king sized Purple mattress. The spacing for the support bars is close to three inches, and the fabric cover for the frame fit well. Our mattress is well supported with this box spring, and doesn't squeak when we move around on it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice breakdown box spring
customer_reviews.text: After much deliberation and research, I decided to try this metal box spring assembly. It arrived unassembled but complete with bolts, nuts and tools. Assembly took me about an hour following the pictorial instructions. Parts are marked well and the assembly instructions are clear enough. Honestly, the tools are pretty much a one time use quality but they worked as intended. My only critique is I'd like to see better information on how to orient or install the cover. I installed it zipper down but changed it to zipper up when I realized it would wear against both the bedframe and the box spring.
customer_reviews.author: Hung Lo

customer_reviews.title: I’m by the king size but is more bigger than regular king size so I have tha problem with this
customer_reviews.text: My bed mattress is king size and so is the base, but the base is 5 inches wider than it’s supposed to be. The base is great material and it is really easy to put together.The only thing I don’t like is that the base is bigger than it’s supposed to be. Yo compré la base King size porque mi colchon es King Size pero la base de la cama viene 5”1/2 más grande que el King size regular, es un buen material me gustó para ensamblarse es fácil de hacerlo pero lo que no me gustó que es más grande de lo normal.
customer_reviews.author: Rosio tejada

customer_reviews.title: Tinkertoy
customer_reviews.text: This was not a job for one person. I didn't need read the assembly directions having an engineering background. So I went through the tedious task with all of the screws and nuts using the supplied ratchet and Allen wrench. There were a few sections where the threaded studs would not line up with the opposing holes. With a little persuasion I managed to attach the bolt. I don't know if this problem was caused by a mishandled package, but the box showed tears, bending and an open corner. The tubular sections are strong, but heavy. Not a fan of this item
customer_reviews.author: steve l

customer_reviews.title: Loving it so far!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in the mail and assembled today. Absolutely love it so far! I got the 9in box spring and it's perfect. It's like 2 inches taller than my original wooden box spring and SO MUCH QUIETER. My husband and I would wake each other up moving around on that thing. We needed a new one bad and this one looked as good as any for people who woyld want to disable it to move in a few months. It was easy to put together and took maybe a half hour. It is silent and I almost cried I was so thrilled. I would definitely recommend! I will update at some point to see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Bekah Chapman

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: After our previous wood box spring broke we were in the market for a new one. All of the furniture stores around us had a 100 dollar delivery fee so we took to amazon I’ve had experience with a Zinus bed and because of the ease of assembly and sturdiness we felt safe getting this brand box spring. It took about 20 mins to assemble all the tools you’ll need are included. It even comes with a nice sleeve to put it in so it looks like a standard boxspring. So far no creaks and super comfortable and sturdy! I would 100% recommended this one.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaMac

customer_reviews.title: The fabric cover is a failure.
customer_reviews.text: The cover is ridiculous to put on. Wrestled with it for 2 hours with 2 people. Its about 2 inches too narrow so that the zipper will not zip on 2 of the 3 sides. Stretched the fabric, repositioned it, stood it up, laid it down, etc. Eventually the zipper pull broke and then the zipper decided to unzip in the middle of itself. Either make the stupid cover bigger, or put zipper pulls on two sides of the cover. It can be used without a cover. I will end up just covering the frame with a flat sheet before putting the mattress on top. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Bartimus

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about putting together this item. I put it together by myself in less than 30 minutes. It was super easy. A lot of the reviews talk about the difficulty of putting the fabric over the metal frame. I had no difficulties whatsoever. Mine fit perfectly. I would highly recommend buying this type of box spring to anyone. Especially this brand. The packaging was great! The way they explain the directions and the little extras that were in the box were cute too. They give you greeting cards to send out. How cute is that!
customer_reviews.author: BRANDIE ROMAN

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer welded a piece upside down. Ruined my weekend.
customer_reviews.text: After 45 minutes of trying to figure out where I went wrong, it turns out the manufacturer welded a piece UPSIDE DOWN. The holes are off by about half inch but when flipped upside down, everything lines up. unfortunately the part has to face upward for the long supports that sit on top. I would drill my own holes but i’m afraid to compromise the strength of the whole unit since this manufacturer error is right in the middle cross-section. What a pain, looks like I won’t be using my new bed anytime soon. And I know it’s not user error, this should be a 1/10 for difficulty. Very grumpy right now.
customer_reviews.author: GoogahDad

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product, but Challenging to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this box spring because it was delivered in a smaller box and easier to move up the stairs into the bedroom. The instructions were well labeled, but a little confusing until you could decipher what that images, letters, and numbers represented. The hardest part was zipping up the cover around the frame. It was almost impossible and we were worried the cover would not fit. My husband and I had to tag team pulling each side together, and zipping. Eventually we got it and it supports our mattress. It is a good box spring and I liked the convince of building it in the room I needed. However, building and moving is a two person job.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but instructions a bit crazy
customer_reviews.text: The end result was great but i was practically dizzy trying to follow the instructions. They are well worded its just lots of bits so I wasn’t as confident as usual. I think i am pretty handy... Update - the first one was queen and I recently got a twin. The twin was easy to put together by myself because fewer parts and i barely needed instrux. I assembled in living room except slats and even dragged into the bedroom myself. The extra tools (I didnt use ratchet) and screws are appreciated if a bit wasteful. I tucked them all into the included ziplock with the instrux just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Robin NYC

customer_reviews.title: Love this spring and mattress
customer_reviews.text: Ok my wife was very sceptical of this but put it together and WOW this thing is awesome simple to put together had simple tools to put it together with if my son or daughter needed a box spring and mattress witch I purchased both I would definitely recommend this to them my wife was looking at the mattress it was compressed in a roll I put the box spring on the frame then took the plastic wrap off the mattress and unbelievable wife likes so much she went and got some Ralph Lauren sheet and a new blanket and pillows great deal for under 400 bucks you would pay 700 or 800 at a mattress store
customer_reviews.author: albert marshall

customer_reviews.title: Good for me
customer_reviews.text: I needed a box spring fast because my old one broke. I have a little car so I couldn’t do to the the store to get one. It was delivered in two days. This was perfect for me because I have narrow stairs, so if it was already put together I would not have been able to get it in my room. I carried it and put it together, by myself and it was pretty easy. It would have been easier with some help of course, but if you don’t have anyone to help this will work for you. My only complaint is that one of the bars is loose, but doesn’t really affect me.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Surprising product!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think I would buy a box spring on amazon. I also didn’t think I would buy a box spring that you have to assemble. But I did and I don’t regret it. The box spring comes in pieces and if you’re great at putting stuff together, you can put together in about an hour. I was not blessed with that talent but I was able to put it together in about 1 and 45 minutes by myself. It is easy to assemble. It is study. I sleep much better knowing that I don’t sleep under a box spring that had a piece of wood that snapped in half.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Who knew a new box spring would solve the problem of an uncomfortable mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I could not fit my original box spring up the narrow staircase into my room of my new house. I thought I would purchase a king size mattress instead, then decided not to because I didn’t have the money and would save up for one. That in mind I figured I needed a box spring in the mean time for the short amount of time I would keep this 11 year old mattress that has been feeling uncomfortable. Never did I imagine a new box spring would solve everything! This mattress is amazing again like the day I bought it! And I owe it all to this amazing box spring!
customer_reviews.author: Timmy Lee

customer_reviews.title: If you don't like overly firm do NOT buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Where did all the traditional wooden box springs go?! My upper back & shoulders KILL whenever I sleep on this bed, it's awful! :( My much taller husband seems to do fine, but I can NOT sleep on this. Our queen mattress is a bit firm but now it's rock hard. I sleep in this bed much more than my husband b/c he travels for work. The mattress is a "Serta Perfect Sleeper" that was our guest bed, (only slept on maybe a dozen times), & moving we had to downsize from a king. I'm very disappointed & need to return this ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Trthskr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install should hold up well for years to come
customer_reviews.text: We bought a new mattress and needed a new box spring. Bought this due to the price and steel structure instead of wooden boards. Assembly took about 20 minutes. All frames were labeled to make assembly as smooth as possible. There are a handful of screws that need to be tightened so that took the most time. Hopefully will last a very long time with this box spring since it's made out of steel. The only thing we didn't like was that it seemed to be about an inch or more smaller than the mattress. We bought this anyway knowing this prior to the purchase. This might be intentional to avoid hitting your legs against is perhaps.
customer_reviews.author: HF

customer_reviews.title: Quality is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This smart box spring is extremely sturdy, made of great quality materials, was extremely easy (with great instructions) to assemble and fit the bed perfectly. The quality, great instructions, ease of assembly and unbelievable sturdiness was a great surprise to us. We order a lot of furniture and household items for our grandchildren and often get frustrated with the awful workmanship and quality of the products we have to assemble. We were so surprised that there is a manufacturer out there in today's world that produces something of such 'Quality' ! I'm so pleased to see that Zinus makes other products we will be looking at.
customer_reviews.author: Janey

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy design for when stairways/elevators are too tight for classic boxspring
customer_reviews.text: This was going up a winding staircase with low head clearance, so this product made it possible for me to have a box spring vs. a platform bed. The assembly was relatively easy, and the product is made of high quality metal. The only minor complaint I have is that the fabric covering is fine -- not like the quilted covering of a typical box spring -- so the light from the window shows through. That's not a problem if you use a bed skirt, but it looks odd without it. I bought both a king and a queen. The queen was super easy to put together, and the king was only moderately more complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great box spring!
customer_reviews.text: It took less than an hour for me,1 person, put this box spring together. I was mentally preparing myself for a challenging assembly due to the reviews but as long as you follow the directions and the numbers on the parts, it shouldn’t be a hassle. I made sure I went into this well rested and after a good meal so I wouldn’t get irritated and start getting sloppy with putting it together. The only thing that was the most work was installing the screws. The price is right too. Sturdy box spring that supports my new 12 inch memory foam mattress just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Got the Zinus queen box spring delivered today! I needed to replace a one-piece box spring that wouldn't fit up narrow stairs, and after watching the product video, I was convinced. Due to limited space, I actually assembled the box spring on the bedframe itself. Super easy to assemble (I'm 5'1" and did it all by myself). Seems to be good quality; all pieces fit together perfectly! The included free gift of note cards was also really nice...I was impressed. We shall see how it holds up to a frisky couple in bed!
customer_reviews.author: H.R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality/ Good value
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was perfect and organized to foster an easy assembly. It takes a minute to figure out the diagram- but once you get started, it’s pretty easy. I appreciate that it also came with the all tools needed to put it together. I’ll update this review after I get the mattress and see how sturdy it feels. I suspect I may need a piece of plywood since I ordered a foam queen mattress. But we will see. So far- I highly recommend this product for reliability of delivery and ease of assembly and appearance of sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Mirella Stalnaker

customer_reviews.title: Do not tighten the bolts until after installing the cross braces!
customer_reviews.text: Once I read over the instructions/pictures, did a small dry-fit, I was able to assemble the box spring fairly easily by myself. My only word of caution is that I initially tightened everything before I put on the cross braces, big mistake. I had to loosen the ends in order to get the cross braces to fit on each end. Once I loosened the ends, the cross braces fit in place and I was able to tighten everything. I will try to update the post once i actually use the box spring; waiting an eternity for the mattress to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Resnick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. But overall...NOT WORTH THE HASSEL
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new box frame as i threw out the old one when i got bunk beds. This is great. Came right away, took me about 10 minutes to put together and my kid loves the difference in the mattress. Update: After having this on the bed.... it just won't stay put. It keeps slipping into the bed itself and causes the bed to be tilted. Now i have to either go out and buy a real box spring or put a full size piece of plywood (or something along those lines) under it to try and help this thing stay in place. Very frustrating. I don't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: 2 Crazy Large Pups

customer_reviews.title: THE STORAGE......it is not wasted.....SPACE.....a....new way to store.....
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC....We, already had on on a bed.....and....LIV D IT....so we bought another......We did nothing t put the fabric on it....instead....we left it open....We did this.....because it is.....GREAT....for a storage place.....I thought of it when.....we got the first one......and....That is so.....NICE TO HAVE....additional storage....just an....idea....I came up with.....and....it works....we are going to lay plywood in there for added.....support for the things stored.....THANK YOU.......
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Pierson

customer_reviews.title: not "Easy to assemble" as stated.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a home builder. He builds his own cabinets. He was previously an auto mechanic for over 10 years. I guess we missed the part about assembly required. He said it was "BS". and a pain in the rear. On the positive note. It was half the price of the foundations at the local furniture store and we wanted delivery to our hunting cabin which was free w Amazon so that was a plus. I wish I would have noticed the assembly required notes.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Matlock

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected storage!!!
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on time and in good shape. Assemble was easy to follow. I put it together myself in about 30 minutes. My cover wasn’t seen all the way around, so I haven’t installed it yet. But that allowed me to discover the storage space it now affords me. I sleep with 5 small dogs, so I change bedding 2-3 times a week and wash on the weekends. My extra bedding can now be stored IN the box spring in Ziplock bags. Shoe boxes also slide in nicely. I’ll probably put a nice fitted sheet over it and call it a day.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Seems small?
customer_reviews.text: Compared to our full size frame and full size mattress this ran small. The other reviews didn't say anything with this issue, so not sure if we just got a lemon or what. I really like how easy it was to put together, and the metal frame is very sturdy, but we had to rig the box spring with the frame so it would fit. I would have returned it but honestly too big of a pain to break the whole thing down and send back. I wouldn't recommend in the full size, can't speak for the others.
customer_reviews.author: ASHLEY CAIN

customer_reviews.title: 78.5" x 75.5" But didn’t fit my 82” wide King bed
customer_reviews.text: So it says this boxspring is 78.5" x 75.5" so explain to me how it did not fit my bed which is 82 inches wide. I wish I would’ve taken a picture. It was way too wide so either the dimensions are not as advertised or they mistakenly measured this all wrong. Additionally I tried getting the cover on every which way I could think, even standing it up and sliding it on like it was a shirt. The nightmare of taking it apart to put it back in the box to go back. The only positive is that I was able to get my money back
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Lady

customer_reviews.title: Surprise, it’s not wood!
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the box I thought they sent me the wrong item. I am so used to seeing box springs come already in one piece/assembled.. I was also taken aback by the metal frame. I’ve only ever seen wooden box frames. When I realized it had to be assembled I figured I’d give it a try. It was super easy to put together with their handy little tool, and once the cover was on no one would know there was metal in there. I actually prefer the metal frame because it won’t breakdown over time the way wood does. This box spring fit perfectly and has been great for our guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: miss218

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, but not amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bed frame for about a year. Pros: Very sturdy Inexpensive Can be assembled by one person Cons: The sheet to cover metal frame broke/ripped as soon as I tried to put it on. I have two king beds in my room pushed together. It was very uncomfortable with my thinner mattress, but was doable with my thick mattress. I would recommend for a guest room. It took me about 2-2.5 hours to assemble by myself. If you have help it can probably be done in around an hour or less.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This mattress foundation met or exceeded all my expectations. It came with very well written, clear instructions which were almost redundant given how easy it was to assemble. The quality of the parts was excellent, assembly was a breeze, and I'm really happy with the finished product. I'm going to need another before long when my next child graduates from her toddler bed, and I'll be buying this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Xander M. Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Best box springs for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a new hybrid mattress and didn't realize that a box springs didn't come with it. I promptly searched local stores and was shocked how much a box springs cost. I went to amazon and for under $100 I could get one delivered. When it arrived I put it together with the pictured instructions (no written instructions) in less then 30 minutes. It had all the tools enclosed that I needed. I assembled the bed and it worked great! My hybrid mattress stayed put and it was the best sleep I've had in ages! Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H

customer_reviews.title: Returned - not technically a box spring.  Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is not technically a box spring. A box spring has springs, a hard flat top to support the weight on the springs and a cover. This is a steel exoskeleton that will take you hours to put together. You then put a slip over it. With no springs. and no true flat platform to distribute the weight evenly - you are relegated to somewhere in the vicinity of steel bars with about 7 inches or more space in between each. For new premium mattresses they recommend a real boxspring or a platform .with slats no more than a few inches a part. If you are spending $1200 on a good mattress - you don't buy this to put underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Titaniumgears

customer_reviews.title: SUPPORT DOES NOT EXIST
customer_reviews.text: 3 weeks ago. 3 weeks ago I submitted a support ticket to the Zinus website asking them for a replacement soft cover for this box spring which broke within 5 minutes of attempting to install it. Not a word of response, no email, no phone call, nothing. We currently have a box spring with no cover and no company support behind it. Will likely be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Item doesnt match size of mattress
customer_reviews.text: After assembly I put my mattress on it and my mattress which is the same size exactly Queen was bigger then this. My mattress is a few inches over each side and looks dumb. My bedframe and my mattress are the same size but this item is too small and my bed always moves and its very annoying. Only reason I gave stars was bc it was cheap and easy to build but something should be done for this error. I literally have been just dealing with it and never do a review but after almost a year I am just completely frustrated with my mattress and this boxspring always moving apart.
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Rip off!
customer_reviews.text: This was a complete rip off! I don't know how this bed got the reviews that it did but I can tell you right now: Find Another Bed!!! Mine has two big sinkholes in it at the bottom. It's not as sturdy as a real mattress the sides sink down when you get in it. I don't know what to do with this hunk of junk bed. I can't send it back. I guess I'll just have to sleep on this uncomfortable hunk of metal until it falls apart because I've used up all the extra money I had.
customer_reviews.author: Kathlene S Henseler

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap in price, but not flimsy either
customer_reviews.text: I kinda resented paying so much for something that wasn't actually a box spring but then again, I didn't want to move a box spring around and anything that furred up that much space would cost this much and be worse. These worked and don't seem to squeak and had a decent cover and just are overall pretty well made and cheaper than a box-spring and easier to get upstairs (well you do pay somewhat for the time of moving by the time of assembly that took about an hour from opening the box to assembly to taking the box and wrapper to the trash)
customer_reviews.author: Tom22

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. We bought one several years ago for our granddaughter’s visits. My husband put that one together and was impressed with the ease and design. My grandson is now ready for a “big boy” bed and so I ordered another box spring for his recent visit. My husband was out of town. I have VERY little patience when it comes to assembling anything, but I had no choice other than to try. So, so, so easy! Everything is packaged so nicely with all the tools included. What a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: crazy4bks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because getting a king size box spring up my stairs would be difficult. This was the perfect solution to that problem. I took about 30 minutes or so to put it together so it wasn't too difficult. The instructions weren't too difficult to follow with the way the pieces were labeled. Once put together, it's pretty solid. A lot more solid than the normal wood box springs. It will definitely last longer and be easy to move if I ever need to.
customer_reviews.author: Bacchus Jackson

customer_reviews.title: This box spring is great!
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today and it went together so easily. I must say that you will still need supports this does not replace supports most queen size beds require. It is the size of a queen mattress, like most box springs, so it will not touch the frame. Sits perfectly inside the frame as does the mattress. No more broken slats on a wooden frame. Like I said I just got it today so I will need to sleep on it to be absolutely certain but I am leaning towards a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Tia Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Downgrade that's considered an upgrade
customer_reviews.text: My husband, before we met, had a Ashley Furniture bed frame that matched the rest of our bedroom furniture. We suffered on that bed for a long long time until I'd had enough. We'll eventually upgrade to a king size bed but our house is too small, so I decided to go back to basics with a good ol metal frame, box spring, and bed skirt. MUCH cheaper and makes ALL the difference in our sleep. The bed doesn't make a peep, like the cheap POS Ashley furniture frame that creaked upon every subtle movement. It doesn't slope down to the middle like the Ashley Furniture frame did. Couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble anyone can do it.
customer_reviews.text: Mega easy to assemble, it can not be easier that that, it took me maybe 20min or less amd the price is not bad the good thing about this is that you can move it very easy brake it into peaces and assemble again, if it gets loose or squeaking you can just tide the bolts again and like new.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Super easy set up, thinking of replacing all now!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what easy assembly! All I needed was a box cutter to open the box and cut the plastic ties holding the rods together, everything else was included! It was super fast and easy to set up and took my husband and I less than 10 minutes to put together. Everything needed was included. We did have trouble with one of the screws, seems like it was a little bent, I left that one for my husband to deal with :) Other than that, it was a great deal and came in early which was perfect timing for us since we were both off! I would highly recommend and plan to change our king size next!
customer_reviews.author: Mele

customer_reviews.title: Some time to put together but at a great value
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a pretty descent box spring. I love that it is metal instead of wood and LOVE that I can unzip the cover to wash it if I need to in the future. They were a little off when they said easy to put together. It took about 40 mins to put together with a drill and me and my bofriend both helping each other. Other then that I think it is well worth its value. I will update if my opinion changes in the future or if their is any issues with the box spring. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei W.

customer_reviews.title: Too small for queen
customer_reviews.text: I put it on my queen bed frame -too small width and length by an inch on all sides. Then I put my queen matress and the matress overlaps it by and inch. Clearly someone needs to get the correct measurments on what a queen boxspting needs to be. Also, the slats that go on top are an inch in width -and about 2 inches in higth- it should be the other way around so that when you lay on the matress -you don't feel a skinny bar everywere. Over all poor ingenerring and not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Zinus Armita steel frame is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd Zinus I've purchased in the last couple years. This brand continues to impress me. The first one was okay but the packaging damaged the contents.. received a replacement that worked out lovely. The second showed great improvements on packaging but also the manufacturers components. Welded joints were straighter and end caps on each of the rods were fully intact and flush with the steel bar.. no fuss! I honestly dont know why anyone would buy big box spring bed frames anymore. This is a far better alternative! Can't say enough.. and no, not all steel frames are the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1,2,3 done
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the instructions intimidate you. I spent almost as much time staring at the pieces and instructions as I did putting it together. It really is as simple as 1, 2, 3, 4, 5.... 1 and 2 go together. From there 3 goes to 3, 4 to 4, 5 to 5 and so on. Just match the numbers. It comes with a wrench and rachet which makes it so easy. Everything is included but the scissors to cut the zip ties that hold the pieces together. The cover slid on very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Coloritaville

customer_reviews.title: Save your time. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Squeaks like crazy even though it's put together securely and tight. Wasn't worth the money or the hassle. Not to mention the issue with shipping which caused me to have to go the post office and have to pick up the item myself. Item was worth trouble than the quality I received. Save your money and buy a local box spring from the store OR spend a little extra cash for a nicer one.
customer_reviews.author: Arneisha

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for our new house for the grand children’s rooms. They are very comfortable. I would put ours on the firmer side for small children. I find it very comfortable and I am a smaller adult. I would purchase this mattress again! Due to the height of the headboard there was a gap the children’s head could fit through so I added a foundation to raise the mattress to cover the gap. It was comfy enough without one except for that safety reason.
customer_reviews.author: D. W.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I ended up putting this bed frame together by myself. I was worried I wasn't going to be able to do it just by myself but it ended up being very easy! I was a little worried about a metal bed frame but I haven't had any issues with this frame! The only thing that was difficult to do by myself was putting the cover over the metal frame, there were some choice words said during that part of the process. Other than that I would recommend this frame!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Elia

customer_reviews.title: Great box springs
customer_reviews.text: I was so skeptical of this set when I purchased. I couldn’t fit my traditional box springs up the stairs to guest bedroom and they were needed. The bed was too low to use slats. My son and I had the box springs assembled and bed completely made in 45 minutes. He led the assembling. Directions were easy to understand. Design is very intuitive. Box springs hold up well to the weight of mattress and occupants. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly W

customer_reviews.title: Something new
customer_reviews.text: When the boxspring came Amazon told me that they have a special delivery service. The special delivery service was UPS. I was expecting a boxspring already put together. PLEASE NOTE: YOU HAVE TO ASSEMBLE THE BOXSPRING. I deleted the picture but I just knew Amazon sent something else. The box it came in was about 5 feet tall and 10 inches in width. I am not handy at all and thank God for my fiance. The pieces are numbered and they have color stickers as well but there are a lot of pieces. It took him about an hour to put it together. I'm pleased with the results but just know you have to assemble this boxspring.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. ThiqCaramel

customer_reviews.title: Tough assemble, but very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known how tough it would be to figure out how to assemble this. You literally get a bunch of steel beams and a diagram... that’s it. However, it is now supporting my brand new Casper mattress so I’m satisfied. The zip cover feels like it is made out of tissue paper and it is already torn in 3 places but I taped it with duct tape and it doesn’t show. So overall I’d say, good value for the money And decent support but not easy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly my ass. It came in a million pieces. Each piece was suppose to be numbered. But they weren't. The first number 1 wasn't labeled and it became a guessing game. I'm sending it back. I'll find one at a regular store that's already put together. Update. I found one at a store all put together. For only hundred bucks. So before you go on Amazon thinking your getting the best deal. Sometimes going to an actual store you'll find that great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Nick/Peart

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this to come because it was the last thing that completed my room. Not going to lie, when I unboxed everything and felt overwhelmed with all the pieces and instructions and felt like I wasn’t going to be able to do it. I actually YouTube a video and then once I got everything in the place that needed to be (the labeling helps a lot on the product.) it was so easy from there and wasn’t as difficult as I thought it was going to be. I’m so happy with the end product
customer_reviews.author: Lit4

customer_reviews.title: A STRONG FOUNDATION STEEL BED BOX SPRING WITHOUT SPRINGS
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a strong durable box spring look no further it’s made of steel hold about 600lbs if I’m correct but read the features just to be sure easy to assemble the frame comes with all the hardware needed an tool but I recommend using your own tools 🧰 to assemble then the cover fits around the frame and zip it up put in place then place the mattress on top without bedroom set or with its your choice it’s a full/queen size
customer_reviews.author: JOHN R VALDEZ

customer_reviews.title: So good we bought it twice
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I moved away and bought this box spring. It worked great! Very comfortable, held the bed nicely. We ended up moving again and just couldn't fit it in our moving box, so we bought another at our new destination because we were so happy with it. It held up great! We are both a bit on the heavier side, myself about 200lbs and him about 270lbs, and we haven't had any issues with bars bending or cracking so far. Easy installation, too.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Bush

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat STEEL!
customer_reviews.text: I never had a steel box spring before but I am very impressed with the sturdy structure of this box spring. My old wooden box spring was loud and falling apart, I don't think I will have that issue with this one. I think everyone needs a steel box spring instead of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel_85

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice
customer_reviews.text: This took forever to figure out, only because the instructions given are SUPER vague, and a lot of the parts didnt even have labels on them to dictate which is what. Once I figured out how a few of the parts go together, I was able to figure out the rest of it without the instructions. Slipping on the cover took damn near forever, we bent the zipper trying to get it to close, and had to take it off and retry 3 different times. Overall it seems nice and does its job well, but holy hell some better instructions would've been great
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Teamwork is key.
customer_reviews.text: The pre-laid screws were hard to line up. I bickered with my assistant. We got it put together in about 45 minutes, including the snugly fit casing and deciphering the instructions. If you aren't clumsy and use common sense, you won't get hurt. You can pinch your fingers, though. I did this without gloves on. I do not recommend to do this alone!
customer_reviews.author: S. E. MCLEAN

customer_reviews.title: Good Boxspring Split
customer_reviews.text: I have a Cape Cod home. You cannot fit a regular Queen or King boxspring up the stairs. I needed something that was a split. I came across this in my search. I took a chance and ordered one. I could not be happier! It was easy to assemble (one you figured out the instructions-could be a bit clearer) and my son helped me set it up. It took an hour. With the cover that is included it is protected and also protects your mattress. It does “creak” a little when I get up, if I’ve been laying in bed watching tv or haven’t moved in awhile. Otherwise very, very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: NikkiMse1978

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was a gimick.  Thanks for proving me wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly thought that I'd be sending this back the same day. I was pleasantly surprised that this is actually sturdy, easy to assemble, and even comes with a little ratchet allen wrench which made it extra easy to assemble. If you are in one of the older buildings that make getting box springs problematic, GET THIS. I'm going to suggest this to everyone I know that has this kind of need. THANKS SLEEP MASTER!
customer_reviews.author: William Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a Nectar mattress but kept our old box spring, bad idea, so I looked around for a replacement and came upon this item. Best idea ever, it works very well as a box mattress box spring. Very good quality, easy to put together, just perfect. I can't state to the weight limit because my husband and I together don't top 300lbs, so we're not good examples for the limit. We don't feel the bars, it looks amazing. We're perfectly happy!
customer_reviews.author: Barbi Smith

customer_reviews.title: No problem with assembly - mattress cover zips on just fine!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned when I ordered this item because I wasn't sure if it would be easy to assemble. I was also concerned that the mattress cover would be difficult to put on by myself after reading reviews. I was pleasantly surprised that all the tools to put it together were included and the directions were easy to follow. I didn't need to have my husband help me with the assembly which was awesome! Would definitely recommend this item. Very sturdy! I think they have corrected the previous problems people were having.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Neena

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I was dead-set on getting a traditional wooden boxspring but couldn't find one any cheaper than this one. So with much reluctance I made the purchase - - easy to assemble and certainly easier to move. Using your own tools will be quicker but they give what you need in the box if you don't have them. Just need a little space to assemble. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazongs Favorite

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This box spring was so easy to put together, about 20-25 minutes by myself. Everything fit perfectly. A little surprise was in the box, a nice little ratcheting wrench for the screws. The only downside I can think of with this, is the flat wrench for the nuts, that bent tightening the first one. So I used a socket for the rest of them. The box spring has made my mattress feel like new again. This was a great purchase. I highly recommend it if your box spring has seen better days..
customer_reviews.author: ErinM.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent option if you can't fit a regular box spring up the stairs!
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a old house with a very narrow staircase up to the master bedroom, the movers could not fit the box spring up the stairs. I have no clue how the previous owner got one up there. I was thinking I would have to buy a new bed that doesn't require a box spring until I saw this option. It came in a box that was easy to maneuver up the steps. Only issue it it does creak a bit against the bed frame. Strips of rubber or cork may help with this.
customer_reviews.author: GSM

customer_reviews.title: Thought through assembly
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that had a well thought out assembly process. It had clear instructions, the bolts were labeled well and stored in a spot that keeps them in order. They also give you a ratcheting driver for the bolts, and this speeds up your process. The only thing to be careful of is how hard you tighten the bolts. You can warp the mounting points if you crank on them to hard. It has held up very well and we cannot be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

product_meta.title: Zinus Armita 9 Inch Smart Box Spring / Mattress Foundation / Built-to-Last Metal Structure / High Profile / Easy Assembly, Queen
product_meta.description: Size:QueenWe like to think of a box spring as the backbone for your mattress. The best kind should be flat, level and built to keep your mattress in tiptop shape; and that’s just what the Armita Box Spring does! With its easily assembled, dependable steel structure, you can rest assured that your mattress will be sitting pretty. An included poly jacquard cover zips on to seamlessly blend with the rest of your bedroom, and with a variety of different thicknesses to choose from, you can pick the one you need to customize the height of the bed. All packed in a compact shipping box with everything included, even our 5-year worry free warranty! Now that’s peace of mind you can sleep on.
feature_bullets: THE LAST BOX SPRING YOU’LL EVER NEED - Unlike a traditional box spring, the Armita is made of solid steel that comes together in no time and is backed by our Zinus “Peace of Mind” 5 year warranty

DURABLY ENGINEERED - Durable steel is used to construct the inside framework of this foundation; slats are spaced 6 - 7 inches apart; twin size supports a maximum weight capacity of 250 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 500 lbs
HIGH PROFILE DESIGN - A 9 inch height is perfect for shorter mattresses or for those who enjoy their bed higher off the floor
